item.title: Jio Financial Services Ltd: Navigating Nifty 50 Membership and Market Dynamics
item.description: Jio Financial Services Ltd has recently captured market attention with its notable inclusion in the Nifty 50 index, a benchmark that significantly influences investor sentiment and institutional holdings. item.title: Eternal Ltd’s Nifty 50 Inclusion Spurs Institutional Interest Amid Volatile Trading

item.title: Max Healthcare Institute Ltd: Navigating Challenges Amid Nifty 50 Membership
item.description: Max Healthcare Institute Ltd, a prominent constituent of the Nifty 50 index, has recently undergone a notable downgrade in its Mojo Grade from Hold to Sell as of 31 October 2025. Despite a modest intraday gain of 1.67% on 3 February 2026, the hospital sector heavyweight continues to grapple with underperformance relative to the broader market benchmark, the Sensex, raising questions about its near-term outlook and institutional investor sentiment. Time: 48 minutes ago
